c1.name: Scarlet Hills
c1.effect:
Decreases **Chihayaburu**'s CD by 10%.
Using **Kazuha Slash** resets the CD of **Chihayaburu**.

c2.name: Yamaarashi Tailwind
c2.effect:
The Autumn Whirlwind field created by **Kazuha Slash** has the following effects:
路 Increases Kaedehara Kazuha's own Elemental Mastery by 200.
路 Increases the Elemental Mastery of characters within the field by 200.

The Elemental Mastery-increasing effects of this Constellation do not stack.

c3.name: Maple Monogatari
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Chihayaburu** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Oozora Genpou
c4.effect:
When Kaedehara Kazuha's Energy is lower than 45, he obtains the following effects:
路Pressing or Holding **Chihayaburu** regenerates 3 or 4 Energy for Kaedehara Kazuha, respectively.
路When gliding, Kaedehara Kazuha regenerates 2 Energy per second.

c5.name: Wisdom of Bansei
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Kazuha Slash** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Crimson Momiji
c6.effect: After using **Chihayaburu** or **Kazuha Slash**, Kaedehara Kazuha gains an Anemo Infusion for 5s. Additionally, each point of Elemental Mastery will increase the DMG dealt by Kaedehara Kazuha's Normal, Charged, and Plunging Attack by 0.2%.
